product_name: Mountain Hardwear Monkista Fleece Jacket - Women's
long_description: You'll love this new take on a popular classic. The women's Mountain Hardwear Monkista Fleece Jacket features a slimmer, more refined shape, but still boasts legendary Monkey Phur(TM) fleece. Extremely warm, soft polyester Polartec(R) Thermal Pro(R) Monkey Phur Lite fleece has spandex added for stretchy comfort. Styling is more fitted than its sister, the classic Monkey Woman fleece jacket. Stretch hem and cuffs seal in warmth. Mountain Hardwear Monkista Fleece Jacket for women has zippered handwarmer pockets.
short_description: You'll love this new take on a popular classic. The women's Mountain Hardwear Monkista Fleece Jacket features a slimmer, more refined shape, but still boasts legendary Monkey Phur(TM) fleece.
